## Blitter.blit() method

Blits given layer of a 2d array texture to a frame buffer

**Signature:**

```typescript
blit(source: Texture2DArray, dest: FrameBuffer, layer: number, sampler?: TextureSampler): void;
```

_(Optional)_ Sampler for source texture
